column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I wanted something on the lighter side
column2: so I got the cajun brick chicken and bosscat fries. Overall pretty good flavor
column4: so food was great! Chicken had a good cajun flavor
column5: with the skin nice and crispy
column6: served over jambalaya style rice.. The bosscat fries where fried potato wedges. Bigger chunks
column7: nice and crispy on the outside.
